name: The Last Puzzle
description:
Do you like puzzle games? How about mystery/adventure games? Maybe a little bit of horror? This game has those aspects that you love to play.

You are the last survivor on earth as far as you know, the year is 2056 but you are still in a 2015 setting. I know, confusing.  You are in a sanctuary surrounded by walls because God knows what's out there. You probably don't want to find out. 

Your only asset is a flashlight, use it sparingly! Explore your neighborhood and solve the puzzles. Are you alone? Or is there still something out there? Discover the truth if you desire.

This game is in early development, bugs will most likely be common! The game will be available for testing soon! If you wish to help out email us. --rezzydesignbusiness@gmail.com -- We should then send a demo to you for testing!
